page.title: 16CLUBS AND GROUPS 1
page.content:
I go to a swimming club called Haverhill Hurricanes.The coach is called Alan Lee. My teacher is called Julie Woodlie. Swimming keeps you fit and can save your life if you fall in a river. We have a hat with the club name printed on it and a club T shirt with the name printed on the back of it.
My mum goes to weight watchers. They have keep fit, talks and raffles. She won a box of Slim-a-soup. She has lost 5 stone so far. She goes once a week.
Haverhill has a nuumber of clubs. There are: a concert club, sports clubs, keep fit clubs, toddlers' groups &c. Many of them meet at schools in the evenings. The Sports Hall also gets used.
